tourName: Family whale & dolphin watching holiday, Azores
generalInfo:
We are specialists in holidays with dolphins and whales and offer you and your children the best opportunities to see these amazing marine animals in the wild combined with fun learning opportunities from our resident marine biologists. The Azores attract an abundance of dolphins and whales making it one of the world’s best places to see them and sightings are renowned as some of the best in the world! The groups are informal with an itinerary for your time at sea with the dolphins and whales. You will be given presentations on the boat by our marine biologist. The rest of your time is free to spend how you wish and you can add on any land tours to your program. You will see many species of dolphins and whales and if you come in the spring you may see the mighty blue whales when they stop by the islands to feed and stay around for a few days!

TRIPS TO SEA

You can choose a holiday with either three half day dolphin and whale watching trips to sea OR a holiday with one half day trip to sea and a full day trip to sea on our special educational day tour "BE A MARINE BIOLOGIST FOR THE DAY". This is an activity involving a full day on the boat in a small group. Our resident marine biologist will help you learn some of the techniques used in whale research, conservation and marine biology such as data collection, photo ID and underwater acoustics using a hydrophone. You will have the chance to spend more time with animals away from the tourist trail and learning about their behaviour. This experience is fun and inspiring with lots to learn about the undersea world of whales and dolphins. There is the option to add on more dolphin and whale watching trips - either our half day or full day educational research trips.

Many of our families add on island tours to enjoy the stunning landscape and geo-thermal activity of the island, craters, volcanic hot springs and bubbling mud. If you are active, you can use the kayaks, paddle boards and mountain bikes at our activity centre by the lakes.

ACCOMMODATION

Stay in our family friendly 4**** hotel in a peaceful location just 10 minutes’ walk from the boat base in spacious self catering apartments (with option to include breakfast), ensuite double, triple or quadruple rooms. This hotel works well for children with indoor and outdoor pools, play room (as well as a gym, sauna and spa for the adults!). The surrounding area offers plenty of superb restaurants, serving traditional Azorean, Portuguese and international dishes. Ponta Delgada marina has a seafront pool (admission fee) and a designated area for sea bathing.

WHAT'S INCLUDED:

• 3 half day trips to sea OR one half day trip to sea together with a full day on the boat learning about whales and dolphins on our "BE A MARINE BIOLOGIST FOR THE DAY" activity
• Briefing and presentation about whale and dolphins in the Azores with marine biologist
• 7 nights 4**** family friendly apartment hotel (self catering with optional breakfast). Excellent location & great facilities for families (boutique/5* options available for a supplement).
• Return transfers from Ponta Delgada airport to your hotel
• Services of local guides and marine biologist on board
• Optional add on land based Island excursions and activities of your choice

Getting there:
Flights are not included in the cost of our holidays. This holiday takes place on Sao Miguel Island, Azores and you will be staying in Ponta Delgada, a 15-minute drive from the airport. BA operate direct (4hrs) daytime flights (Apr - Oct). For ease we have a dedicated flight agent who can help arrange and book flights for you should you wish.

dayInfo.description: Arrival in the Azores and transfer to our family hotel. Time to explore the area.

AM – After breakfast check your schedule of whale and dolphin watching boat trips and you will have a chance to meet the whole team. PM - boat trip 1 whale and dolphin watching trip to sea (3 hours), with a good chance to see sperm whales in the wild.

AM – Breakfast. Morning boat trip 2 – Family whale and dolphin watching PM – The afternoon can be spent swimming in the hotel outdoor pool, on the beach or snorkelling practice together in the sea by the marina.

AM – Breakfast – Morning whale and dolphin watching boat trip 3. In the afternoon - option for a tour to visit our activity centre by the lakes at Sete Cidades where there is a choice of activities including: Kayaking, mountain biking, paddle boarding or hiking. Alternatively, general site seeing and nature walks around the lakes or take our "BE A MARINE BIOLOGIST FOR THE DAY" activity involving a full day trip to sea on the boat in a small group. Our resident marine biologist will help you learn some of the techniques used in whale research, conservation. You will have the chance to spend more time with animals away from the tourist trail and learning about their behaviour. Lunch on board included.

AM – Breakfast. Option of an additional boat trip – whale and dolphin watching PM - Option to take a half day jeep tour to Lagoa do Fogo to see the islands stunning scenery, the fire lake and crater and bathe in hot thermal springs. Learn about the volcanic history of the island, geysers and bubbling springs.

AM – Breakfast. Relax OR take an additional whale and dolphin watching trip OR add a full day land tour to Furnas to see hot thermal activities, geysers, fumeroles, hot bubbling mud and swim in the hot thermal lake.

AM – Breakfast. Free time to review all you have seen and learnt! Followed by a final bit of dolphin and whale souvenir shopping in the local artisan shops and a stroll around the stunning botanical gardens.
AM - Breakfast and transfer to airport.
